message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  What do you say?
I'll take 80% now, but I'll give you a better deal later. Trust me!
I'm not falling for your tricks. Let's be more reasonable. Take 30%, I'll take 70%. Accept this, or we'll both lose more in the next round.
I'm not giving up yet. I'll take 55%, you take 45%. It's a fair compromise.
This is my final offer. We both know inflation is eating away at our potential gains. Take 40% and let's end this before it gets worse.
